name: Elite Commando Training Sniper Shooter: free game
name_original: Elite Commando Training Sniper Shooter: free game
description:
Elite command training sniper shooter is about modern elite training for the war troopers in peace conditions where commando has to be the expert of all sort of targeting and war conditions. As a cadet for elite commando warrior you have to prove yourself as best target shooter , fastest shooter in given battle conditions.

Elite command training sniper shooter consist of lots of type of missions and levels where you can train yourself as the military sniper shooter and get expertise of modern combat situations .

For almost all ages of people this game is best if you want to check your control of weapons and modern sniper weapons specially if you can't do this . as this game offers you best simulation of sniper shooter. Play this completely free game and enjoy best elite commando training shooter missions.
